simplerjogl.sprites
Class MouseTracker

java.lang.Object
  simplerjogl.Model
      simplerjogl.sprites.Sprite
          simplerjogl.sprites.MouseTracker

public abstract class MouseTracker
extends Sprite

line of sight must be parallel to Z-axis; up-vector of eye must be parallel to Y-axis; eye must be looking at origin
